plot: A young girl reads her dead father's diary and learns of how, when he was 12-years old, he and his friends fought communists to rescue their teacher
title: Appaga namgigo gan hunjang
plot_es: A young girl reads her dead father's diary and learns of how, when he was 12-years old, he and his friends fought communists to rescue their teacher
plot_en: A young girl reads her dead father's diary and learns of how, when he was 12-years old, he and his friends fought communists to rescue their teacher
